headline: Jim Cramer Calls Colgate-Palmolive Company (CL) a Recession-Resistant Winner
summary: We recently published a list of Jim Cramer’s Game Plan for Next Week: 25 Stocks in Focus. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Colgate-Palmolive Company (NYSE:CL) stands against other stocks that Jim Cramer discussed.
